data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
SQL::Preproc (shortened from SQL::Preprocessor for the sake of
    brevity) is a source filter that translates SQL statements embedded
    in perl scripts/modules into DBI calls; hence, it should reside in
    the SQL::* namespace. To my knowledge, no similar source filter
    exists for Perl. Embedded SQL is common in numerous other languages,
    including C/C++, COBOL, and Java. And now Perl!

    FYI: see http://www.presicient.com/sqlpp
